verbs.description: [ARG1: arson] [V: suspected] [ARGM-TMP: after pen lit on fire at bank] police are investigating a possible arson case in which someone lit a pen on fire and put it in a drop box at a sioux falls bank mark twain sioux falls arson us bancorp u s bank sam clemens
